Based on the given list of movies, I would recommend "Knocked Up" and "Man on Wire". These two movies have a similar theme of self-discovery and learning from one's mistakes. Additionally, both movies feature talented actors who bring their characters to life in a compelling way.
On the other hand, I would not recommend "300" or "Born on the Fourth of July". While these two movies are based on historical events, they do not have a similar theme of self-discovery and learning from one's mistakes. Additionally, while both movies feature talented actors who bring their characters to life in a compelling way, "300" is a much more violent and action-packed movie than "Born on the Fourth of July".
